fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We referred to figures from a recent study into funding in primary schools by Dr Ali Body and Dr Eddy Hogg as being for the UK. However, their research was limited to Kent. In addition, the study’s authors were not both from Canterbury Christ Church University as the piece said. Hogg is from the University of Kent (‘Children now have to raise funds for their own education’, 14 August, page 30). • Other recently corrected articles include: Andrew Brunson: the US pastor at the heart of an international crisis Gemma Chan: ‘Is it better to give or to receive? Are we talking about oral sex?’
